--- title: "Graphic design" date: "2023-08-28" date_end: "2023-09-01" --- For this example, I'm going to critique and improve this random flyer I found posted in the BYU library in September 2018: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](../../../../../projects/02-example/original-from-hbll.jpg){fig-align='center' width=50%} ::: ::: It's not the best designed poster, but it's incredibly typical of what you see in the real world. By applying the principles of CRAP, we can improve the poster significantly.
